survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
Empezamos!
cool
now i'm at the start point with a twig to my left. where to, amigo?
Go forward to the tiger.
alright, passed the twig and now i'm on the small island with the tiger
what's next, mate?
Forward again to the right side of the parrot
roger that! now i'm on the big island with the parrot sitting on a tree
done. your move?
Go left between the parrot and elephant, then left again to the frog
done and done, i'm on the island with the frog now
what's next, chief?
make a uturn and cross the alligator
okie dokie
just passed the crocodile, now i'm back with the elephant again. what now, mate?
cross the rocks toward the giraffe
just crossed the rocks, chillin' with the giraffe now
what's my next move, dude?
left turn past the snake and you'll be there
crossed the snake
and voila! the treasure is right here. *finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Yes!
nice! first thing, make a few steps left, you're heading towards a wooden bench
cool, right?
Got it
great! next up, cross that trail there and head towards that florist stand
but psyche! don't actually go to the florist, do a little u-turn to your left and cross the trail again. look! our white fluffy friend's still there
Lol. ok
haha, perfect! now, go over the trail, heading south
you'll spot another cutie white dog chilling next to a picnic mat. look familiar?
I see it
super! now, step over the mat, slight touch to the bowl of berries, and then keep moving to your west
ok
awesome! find another wooden branch? cross it, but this time you're heading north
Ok, I'm there
cool! scoot around that green bush to your right, but don't touch it! it'll lead you right to the florist stand
I'm by the florist
perfect! next, take a left turn, scoot under the stand, and walk towards a huge bridge
there should be a couple cycling. isn't that sweet?
I see them. Awww
haha! good
stay on the trail and keep going west, just past the bridge, you'll spot two elderly folks on a bench engrossed in their newspapers
Ok
cool! now, take a few steps south, find your spot between the old folks and another wooden branch
see a green bush by the end of the branch?
Yes I do
perfecto! your next move is east, just slide through between the branch and the bush
keep it chill!
I see the deer
whoop, there you go! you found the young deer
great job!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Yes I am
awesome! i'm in a tent at the north of our map
where to now?
Go south between the dog and the rock wall
alright
i'm now standing near the fire, the dog's on my left, and there's a red mushroom to my right. where next?
Turn left past the dog and go between the dog and the fire
got it, now i'm between the dog and the fire
Keep the fire on your right, and go forward until you see the mushroom, then take a slight left
all set, i see the blue car in front of me
what now?
Go towards the car and then turn around, staying on the path
done, walking on the path with the car behind me now. i see a blue telescope ahead
i guess i'm heading south. am i right?
Yes, you are, one step ahead of me. Keep going south. But before the path curves to the left, you need to keep going straight so you are between the telescope and bush
nailed it! standing between the telescope and the bush
i see some rocks and a wooden house not far from me
Yes, keep going forward to the house, and you're there
wow, made it to the house! *finished* this was fun, let's do it again sometime!

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Yes I am
awesome, now go under the first palm tree towards the south-west, then turn right to cross the second palm tree
once you're near the third tree, take a sharp left turn and keep moving south. got it?
Got it
great! now, do you see a brown puppy ahead? you have to head left of him
after that, just follow the path which curves slightly left and then heads south. nice and easy stroll
I don't see a path, but I am south of the puppy
good lad! you're doing well
next, you're going to see a couple of rocks. move between the big one on the left and the small one on your right towards the sea
Towards the crab?
exactly! let's get our feet wet! move right, going along the big rock that you just passed, and keep going west
the water's fine, isn't it?
Yes :D
fantastic! let's keep swimming for a bit
see that medium rock ahead? once you pass it, you'll spot a shark. make a hard right then
Towards the beach ball?
yes, that's it! follow the path back to the land, we're done swimming for now
let's go between that rock and the colorful ball, and keep moving north
Ok
good job! now you're gonna veer a bit to your left and head north-west
Ok
ahead, you'll see a red tent and a big this speaker
pass between them, sound good?
Done
fantastic! now, go around that red tent in an arc and head south towards the sea
Ok
just don't go swimming again! right at the shore, take a sharp right turn and head west below the red kayak
getting the hang of this yet?
Yes, I'm following
perfect! you're doing a great job! now turn right, and move along the kayak until you see a small green bush
congratulations, you've reached the end of this round!

general_survey.answer: yes, 6 months working on an internship
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I don't mind; I know some of the reasons I do it, and I think it's neat because I like languages.
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:
Any final comments about your language background?
